articles.description: The nearly complete fossilized remains of a 161-million-year-old stegosaurus discovered in Colorado in 2022 will be auctioned by Sotheby’s in New York next week. Sotheby's officials have named the dinosaur Apex. They say it stands 11 feet tall and measures 27…
